's an innovator and entrepreneur to the core, and this role suits him perfectly," Eric Schmidt said. "As Google has grown, managing the business has become more complicated," Eric Schmidt wrote. So Larry, Sergey Brin and I have been talking for a long time how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making-- and over the holidays we decided now was the right moment to make some changes to the way we are structured. The news came just before Google announced earnings for its most recent quarter. At$ 8.44 billion, Google's fourth-quarter revenue jumped 26 percent from a year earlier. Oprah Winfrey narrates a biography-and-interview show about stars- Condoleezza Rice , Maya Angelou , Simon Cowell - who embody qualities she admires. When Oprah Winfrey talks about, say, Jay-Z, it sounds as if she is also talking about herself: If you don't know who you are before fame hits, you will definitely end up losing yourself in all the opinions around you.( See the top 10 Oprah Winfrey controversies.)
